subject: RE: [junit] Recover from test hangs
msgSnippet: Run your tests with the text test runner.  When it s hung do a Ctrl-Break (on unix you have to send a signal, not sure which one). This causes the JVM to do a
messageBody:
Run your tests with the text test runner. When it's hung do a
Ctrl-Break (on unix you have to send a signal, not sure which one).
This causes the JVM to do a thread dump. You can see a stack trace of
each thread and hopefully find your deadlock.

-----Original Message-----
From: Thach Nguyen [mailto:thach@...]
Sent: 14 August 2001 18:20
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Recover from test hangs


Hello,

Could someone advice on how to perform recovery from test hangs. Thanks
very much.

Thach.
